name: Shepherd (ppowersteef)
description:
A wizard had seen enough adventure, and makes up for a living as a shepherd.
As peaceful as the day is, the nights are overflown with predators trying to steal the sheep.
Protect the sheep over the night, and they'll reward you with cash in the next morning.

In 3 weeks, the day of the Shepherd Con has arrived, where you showcase all your sheep, If your sheep value is high enough, then you win the game.
To encourage the shepherd, he set up milestone goals each week to keep track of his growing herd, the week goal must be met to progress. 
However, the predators will grow stronger as the weeks progresses, be prepared for enemy ambushes!

Controls:
Move with the arrow keys.
Interact with Z
Shoot with X

At daytime, you can interact with 3 objects:
- Bell: Starts the upcoming night (You'll need sheep to activate it)
- Shop: You can buy sheep, elemental wands, and a dog that fights predators.
- Catalog: shows the amount of a certain type of sheep, see various sheep abilities, and their total value after one night, you can also view your progress on the current goal.

Hope you'll enjoy it!
